mapper.select: SELECT TRD_SEQ , ACT_SEQ , REL_TRD_SEQ , TRD_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM BC_CD_DT X WHERE A.TRD_CD = X.CD AND X.CD_COL = 'TRD_CD') AS TRD_NM , AMT , ITM_CD , (SELECT ITM_NM FROM KX_ITM_MT X WHERE A.ITM_CD = X.ITM_CD) AS ITM_NM , QTY , NOTE , CASE WHEN TRD_DT != '0000/00/00 00:00' THEN DATE_FORMAT(TRD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ELSE '' END AS TRD_DT , CASE WHEN ED_DT != '0000/00/00 00:00' THEN DATE_FORMAT(ED_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') ELSE '' END AS ED_DT FROM AC_DT A WHERE ACT_SEQ = #{actSeq} ORDER BY TRD_DT DESC, TRD_SEQ DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
